name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior SRE Engineer with 13+ years of comprehensive experience in cloud-native environments, specializing in **AWS**, **Kubernetes**, and **Terraform** for effective infrastructure automation. Expertise in CI/CD practices and a robust understanding of security measures, ensuring resilient and secure system operations. Proficient in monitoring and observability tools such as **Datadog**, **Prometheus**, and **Grafana** to maintain high-performance applications in both healthcare and financial sectors.

Skilled in full stack development with hands-on experience in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, coupled with deep expertise in frontend frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, and backend technologies such as **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven ability to build AI/ML-powered platforms that facilitate predictive analytics and automation, alongside a strong background in MLOps using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Well-versed in compliance-driven development, ensuring solutions align with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards.
